title: LF supp for rank 5's
body:
Looking for 1 (maybe 2) more to join team; you pretty much can play any role, as we have members that dont mind playing wherever in game. More interested if you are a supp main though. team consisting of silver to plat members. Bunch of fun guys and gal; all in uni or working (so not really looking for pre/high schoolers). 

Non-ragers, laid back peeps; play at least twice a week. Keep toxity minimum - win/lose. We even play norms more often for fun.

Use skype. So interested leave a message here; I check daily. Comment IGN, Roles,age, and something about yourself. If not interested in team, join us in some norms anyways.

So, woppitydooda.
Frostwolf77

replies.body: I'm a noob plat 3 support main who enjoys playing 5s :)
gold 4 support main been playing since start of s2  hit me up ign HI I AM LIAM

Unranked (due to inactivity of 12 months) support main who's interested in becoming an active player once more. 
Though I've never reached the higher Tier rankings in the past but since I have returned to the scene my focus on fundamentals has become more of a discipline compared to instinct. 

A player since Season one my experience with every role has been touched upon with varying depth, however I have abandoned the idea of specialising outside of support simply because it's the role that I naturally lean towards due to the set responsibilities that come with the role. Patience, critical, and slowly becoming more of an active thinker regarding the underlining mechanics I aim to improve with each game and promote a friendly environment for both teams. 
Happen to be slightly curious feel free to message me: (IGN) AtomicDesuBomb, age? Old enough to live out of home. <3
Read post... I can add you guys if you keen to join norms. I might have to talk to team or do a first come first serve or even a draw to see who gets in the team (rank 5's).
Hi! Silver 1 Support Main but of course play other roles, IGN is "Twist" just give me an add, happy to play ranked or even normals! (^*.*)>

Hey i'm a killer Thresh, Malphite, Leona and Annie, main supports last season were thresh and malphite.
this season im into my anti-metas, like ekko tank supp, (actually works, weird right? lol), my best anti-meta is ahri supp. 
But i'll stick to meta if thats what you'd prefer. currently B3 but im making the climb haha
Finished school last year and looking for some fun, and to see how far i can get in a team of non-feeders!
hit me up IGN SgtPuffles

Look at my match history of ranked sup plays (Main Leona,Thresh,Annie,Morgana,Nautilus(Naut will be soon once I buy him))
P.S. Don't bother looking if I need a mic which is prob what your looking for so this may have been a waste of your time (Otherwise look for 'mutley')
